problem.markdown:
>>What are two ways of loading data into Excel by using queries in Excel 2016?<<
[x] Load to Excel table [ ] Load to Excel ODBC connection [ ] Load to Excel hidden worksheet [x] Load to Excel Data model
[explanation] You can load data to Excel table and/or to Excel data model. [explanation]
problem.p: What are two ways of loading data into Excel by using queries in Excel 2016?

checkboxgroup.label: What are two ways of loading data into Excel by using queries in Excel 2016?

div.p: You can load data to Excel table and/or to Excel data model.
